name: Lost & Found (Miazyn)
description:
You play as a small kid named Johan who after a bomb attack has been seperated from his mother. On your search for your mother you meet various side characters and complete tasks. Will you find your mother or will death do us apart?

The game is from the perspective of the child and so various things arent always what they seem to be at first.

Game made by Miazyn, Jul#3855, 🌸Mimilicious🌸#0132

Various Audio from https://opengameart.org
Art by Jul#3855, 🌸Mimilicious🌸#0132
Coding by Miazyn(Me owo)
